dictionary.title: Use_Therapeutic_Miscellaneous
dictionary.desc: Dictionary consisting of 9 terms plus 45 related synonyms. Some entries may also include the term's: source, description, wikidataID, chebiID, chebiName, FDAcode
dictionary.author: Emanuel Faria, President of ®Verriclear Natural Skin Essentials Ltd. https://www.verriclear.com
dictionary.contributor: Peter Murray-Rust: Reader Emeritus in Molecular Informatics, Unilever Centre, Dept. Of Chemistry University of Cambridge

entry.name: mastogenic
entry.description: The natural swelling and growth of breast tissues.

entry.name: congestant
entry.description: An agent that causes congestion, which is the act of gathering into a heap or mass (accumulation).

entry.name: anti-tussive
entry.description: Substance (especially of a drug) used to prevent or relieve a cough

entry.name: anti-halitosic
entry.description: An agent that relieves bad breath.

entry.name: anti-hangover
entry.description: Any substance introduced into a living organism with therapeutic or diagnostic purpose.

entry.name: anti-jet-lag
entry.description: Any substance introduced into a living organism with therapeutic or diagnostic purpose.

entry.name: anti-periodic
entry.description: An agent that prevents regular recurrence of the symptoms of a disease, as in malaria.
